CurrentTab.description: Indicates the currently selected tab in the bottom navigation bar of the Spotify app. The options include Home, Search, Your Library, Premium, and Create.

NowPlayingTrack.description: Details of the track currently playing in the Spotify app, including the track title and artist name.

TopNavigationFilter.description: The filter applied in the top navigation bar of the Spotify app, indicating the content type being viewed. Options include All, Music, and Podcasts.

PlaylistOptions.description: Options available in the playlist menu, including Playlist, Blend, and Jam, each with a description of their functionality.

PlaylistCreationState.description: Represents the state of the playlist creation process in the Spotify app, including the name of the playlist being created and the available actions (Cancel or Create).

PlaylistDetails.description: Details of the playlist currently being viewed or edited in the Spotify app, including the playlist title, creator's name, and the option to add songs.

SearchPageState.description: Represents the state of the Spotify app's search page, including the search query prompt and suggestions for what to search.

SearchResultsState.description: Details of the search results displayed in the Spotify app, including the type of result (song, artist, playlist), the associated name or title, and result option

SongDetailsAndActions.description: Represents the details and available actions for a specific song in the Spotify app. This includes the song title, artist, album, and a list of possible actions the user can take.
